title: CompletionException when stopping besu during sync

labels.name: dev experience
labels.description: The build system, things that enable easier development etc.

body:

Thanks for reporting this. There are a couple of instance where this happens but it's typically not indicative of something actually going wrong in the shutdown process. Can you confirm that everything was alright when you restarted the node?

Everything was fine when I restarted the node. I am reporting these only because I was encouraged to on the Besu discord, along the lines of “Besu should catch all exceptions”. I haven’t had any issues with Besu corrupting data or refusing to sync, so far.
Ok cool, yes, we welcome the issue! We'll get around to tidying this up someday.
